name: Iksland defender
description:
Defends the crystal-thing from swarm of monsters! Iksland defender is a tower defense game that you can control every tower freely in a side-view platformer style.

  • 20 Defenders(5 in demo)
  • 3 Upgrade tiers each with 4 levels
  •  8 Tracks with more to come.
  • 28 enemies.
  • Adventure on the title screen to unlock new tracks.
  • 3 Game modes
  • Unlock-able main player to modify gameplay.
  • Unlock perks for each defenders by leveling up.
  • Buy new amulets to boost up defender.
  • Title screen
    • W, A, S, D : movement
    • space : jump
    • E, left click : interact
  • Game play
    • Global
      • ctrl + space : Start wave
      • ESC : pause
      • 1 - 9 : use ability
    • No tower selected
      • left click : Select tower
      • W, A, S, D : Move screen
    • Any tower selected
      • W, A, S, D : Move tower
      • E : interact
      • space : jump
      • Tab : Swap upgrade, data page
      • Q : Change targeting (first, close, strong, mouse)
      • Z, X, C : Upgrade tier 1, 2, 3
      • delete : sell tower

The game is currently in a very early development stage. This demo serves as a test for gameplay, balance, etc. All feedback are very appreciated. New demo will come out in the future. You can follow the development of this game by follow me on twitter (@Makham_dev).
